<!-- ======== START OF CLASS DATA ======== -->
<H2>
<FONT SIZE="-1">
coreservlets</FONT>
<BR>
Class  DBResultsTableModel</H2>
<PRE>
<A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/Object.html">java.lang.Object</A>
  |
  +--<A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/javax/swing/table/AbstractTableModel.html">javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel</A>
        |
        +--<B>coreservlets.DBResultsTableModel</B>
</PRE>
<HR>
<DL>
<DT>public class <B>DBResultsTableModel</B><DT>extends <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/javax/swing/table/AbstractTableModel.html">AbstractTableModel</A></DL>

<P>
Simple class that tells a JTable how to extract
  relevant data from a DBResults object (which is
  used to store the results from a database query).
  <P>
  Taken from Core Servlets and JavaServer Pages
  from Prentice Hall and Sun Microsystems Press,
  http://www.coreservlets.com/.
  &copy; 2000 Marty Hall; may be freely used or adapted.
<P>
<DL>
<DT><B>See Also: </B><DD><A HREF="../serialized-form.html#coreservlets.DBResultsTableModel">Serialized Form</A></DL>
<HR>

<P>
<!-- ======== INNER CLASS SUMMARY ======== -->
